data.title: Pressmart Corporate Profile
data.meta_description: Pressmart Corporate Profile - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. 1/28/13 Page 1 Bodhtree.com

2. Contents • Company Background • Service Overview • Features • Products • Value Propositions • Customers and Partners • Testimonials Page 2

3. Introduction Pressmart enables print publishers to present their content online on multiple digital channels. • Pressmart is born Cloud in 2004 and re-born as Mobile and Social in 2011 • Headquarter/Global delivery center in India has Sales offices /representation in US, UK, Middle • East, Germany, Indonesia,Philippines, Malaysia, and Australia Global customer base in 57countries with thousands of publications Relationships with leading distributors, printers, associations, online media services and telecom • carrier Experienced Leadership and Board of Directors with strong engineering and business teams • Platform converging cloud / mobile / social paradigms • Page 3

4. Service Overview • On-Demand delivery of content on all digital channels •Same-as-print online edition, mobile edition, tablet edition (HTML5) and native apps •100% managed process includes – Conversion, Hosting, Subscriptions Management, Single-copy Sales, Ad Sales, Ad Management Tools, Analytics, Auto-archival, SEO and Social Media. • No upfront investment – Pay as you go Page 4

5. Features •Same-as-print ePub edition •Article-level tagging •Interactive and engaging rich media features – video, hot links •Search engine and Social Media ready •Integrated Subscription Management, Ad Sales • ABC and BPA compliant reporting (in some countries) •Access to past issues and digitized archives •Rich user behavior analytics •Multi-channel delivery on Web, Mobile, Tablet, RSS and Pod cast Page 5

7. Value Proposition - eReplica Tap readers worldwide with Search Engine Friendly capability. Increase revenue through Paid Subscriptions and Ads. • Reduces long distance delivery cost. • Understand your readers better through granular analytics. • Improve Editorial efficiency with easy access to Back Issues. • Monetize Back Issues through Paid Subscriptions. • Increases your ABC and BPA certified circulation. • Re-purpose your content using standard XML of your publication . • • Page 7

8. Value Proposition - ePortal No IT expertise needed for setup or maintenance. Advanced publishing capabilities for a low monthly fee. No • license fee. No hidden costs. • Free feature updates with no dependence on IT. Create a 360-degree online experience with Add-on • Modules. • Zero go-to-market time. Faster ROI with embedded marketing and monetization • tools. • SLA-backed security, availability, reliability and scalability. No exit barrier. 100% content export and backup utilities. • Repurpose content with seamless integration with • Pressmart eReplica products. • Page 8

9. Value Proposition – Mobile Apps • No IT expertise needed for setup or maintenance. • Hassle-free feature updates. • Pay-as-you-go (No Capex) model allows Publishers to map * Investments with Returns. • Zero go-to-market time. • Repurpose content with the seamless integration of Pressmart eReplica products. • Private branding with dynamic change management capabilities. • No exit barrier. No license fee. No hidden costs. • SLA-backed security, availability, reliability and scalability. Page 9

10. Value Proposition – eArchives Collective experience of digitally archiving over 400 years of archives from microfilm, microfiche, • newsprint and PDF formats for leading publishing houses across the world Protect your archives from natural wear and tear and hazards by having an effective backup strategy in • digital format Monetize on your archives by putting them up for online subscription or generate ad revenue through • them Save prime real-estate, as with digital copies being available, you can store your original copies • remotely Page 10

11. Value Proposition – Solutions Presence in CISCO Pressmart is a preferred software vendor to CISCO systems. Pressmart provides product engineering, specialized quality assurance services to CISCO projects. Pressmart engineers are currently working on major enterprise initiatives of CISCO products delivering the security products and helps CISCO to reduce their time to market throughout its QA and Product Engineering services. Pressmart specializes in Testing and Quality Management and has expertise in testing of ERP and other integrated applications. CISCO is currently leveraging our quality program management, proven software processes, methodologies, and tools. Our skilled software product engineers with deep experience and expertise in leading edge technologies help increase the quality of successful products for CISCO. Relay Process is only for PMBU which is the hybrid of Agile and CISCO CPDM processes. Complete understanding of Securent above services. Pressmart accelerates the design, development, and maintenance of CISCO and the product knowledge helps the team to be more collaborative Page 11

12. Value Proposition – Solutions Pressmart with Salesforce CRM Consulting In the last few years we have build a solid foundation and expertise to our CRM Consulting • Our dedicated team of Salesforce CRM Certified consultants address some of the critical success factors in CRM Implementation • As economy turns more demanding on IT budgets, SaaS based CRM has became a reality. Our understanding of SaaS and Cloud computing business models supplements our CRM • Consulting expertise to bring transparency to your sales and marketing Our high end research and strategic insights enables us for superior CRM implementation across various verticals • Force.com Competency Our CoE comprises of competency and methodology for Force.com Dedicated resources for Force.com development and consulting • Force.com is a logical extension of our CoE which comprises of Cloud platform for • Force.com development • Deliver a complete platform with a simple model to build your apps Customize applications and real time database management • Expertise on AppExchange development and deployment • • Page 12

22. Staff Augmentation - Services Pressmart's highly skilled resources, process framework and technologies addresses critical on-demand staffing to various global customers. Our On-demand staffing services helps you in: * Eliminate project backlogs * Increase capacity while minimizing risk * Reduce costs * Accelerate IT project deliverables * Provide you with highly technical resources * Meet your project specific timelines Page 22
